lines.text: You blew Helen's medal for good. One more like that it's the glue factory - for both of us.
How about a wrestler named 'Aspercel the Terrible'?

[Riding bareback]
Now you try it again and don't depend on the reins. Balance. legs. Make him know what you want him to do.

[On Aspercel bareback]
Okay, I'll try. Come on, Aspie. Communicate.
